パッケージ io.github.townyadvanced.flagwar.config

クラス FlagWarConfig

java.lang.Object
io.github.townyadvanced.flagwar.config.FlagWarConfig
public final class FlagWarConfig extends Object
Transitional class holding values from the configuration file, as well as defining some defaults.

  • メソッドの詳細

    • isAffectedMaterial

      public static boolean isAffectedMaterial(org.bukkit.Material material)
      Checks if a Material should be affected by an operation.
      パラメータ:
      material - simple Material to check.
      戻り値:
      True if the matched Material is used in constructing a war flag's base or light, or the wireframe; Or, if the material is one of the timer materials.

    • getBroadcastAccuracy

      public static String getBroadcastAccuracy()
      Query the accuracy level for coordinate-related broadcasts.
      戻り値:
      Output of rules.flag_broadcast_accuracy.

    • getTimerBlocks

      public static org.bukkit.Material[] getTimerBlocks()
      Returns a copy of the Material array making up the WarFlag's timer indicators.
      戻り値:
      a clone of the Material array.

    • getCustomTimerBlocks

      public static org.bukkit.Material[] getCustomTimerBlocks()
      Returns a copy of the Material array making up the WarFlag's timer indicators.
      戻り値:
      a clone of the Material array.

    • getDepthAllowance

      public static int getDepthAllowance()
      戻り値:
      The configuration value for the depth, below a world's sea level, a flag may be placed.

    • setEditableMaterials

      @NonNls public static void setEditableMaterials()
      Sets the editableMaterialsInWarZone.

    • isUsingDefaultTimerBlocks

      public static boolean isUsingDefaultTimerBlocks()
      Check if default timer blocks are being used, as set in the configuration file.
      戻り値:
      True if timer_blocks.use_default is set to true in the configuration file.

    • isHologramEnabled

      public static boolean isHologramEnabled()
      戻り値:
      isHologramEnabled, the cached result of isHologramConfigured().

    • getHologramConfig

      public static List<Map.Entry<String,String>> getHologramConfig()
      Retrieve the ConfigurationSection for the hologram lines. Then, instantiate an ArrayList for the hologram settings. If the hologram lines section is empty, log the error, and disable holograms. Store the maximum and minimum indexes. If there are indexes less than zero, ignore those indexes and log the error. Then, for each supplied hologram line, pass the data through Colors.translateColorCodes(String) to parse any color codes, validate the type and data, and add the line to the hologram settings. If type or data are invalid, log the error, and set the line to an empty one. Finally, return the parsed hologram settings as a List of Map.Entry's containing the type and data of each line.
      戻り値:
      Hologram settings List.

    • getHologramSettings

      public static List<Map.Entry<String,String>> getHologramSettings()
      戻り値:
      HOLOGRAM_SETTINGS, defined by getHologramConfig().

    • getTimerText

      public static String getTimerText()
      戻り値:
      The hologram timerText, if it exists, defined in getHologramConfig().

    • hasTimerLine

      public static boolean hasTimerLine()
      戻り値:
      TRUE if a timer line is defined in getHologramConfig().

    • isAllowingAttacks

      public static boolean isAllowingAttacks()
      Check if attacks are allowed or not, as set in the configuration file.
      戻り値:
      True if rules.allow_attacks is set to true in the configuration file.

    • getFlagLifeTime

      public static Duration getFlagLifeTime()
      Gets the Duration for the flag.waiting_time in the configuration file. If null, 30 seconds is the assumed default duration.
      戻り値:
      A Duration.

    • isDebugging

      public static boolean isDebugging()
      Check if extra "debug" messages should be written to the JUL logger on the WARN level.

      (Lazy way to bypass Spigot's log4j settings.)

      戻り値:
      true if configured to show debug messages.

    • getFlagPhasesDuration

      public static Duration getFlagPhasesDuration()
      Get the Duration of each timer-material phase in a war flag's lifecycle.
      戻り値:
      The Flag Life-time, divided by the length of getTimerBlocks().

    • isDrawingBeacon

      public static boolean isDrawingBeacon()
      Check if the beacon should be drawn.
      戻り値:
      the result of "beacon.draw", from the configuration file.

    • getMaxActiveFlagsPerPerson

      public static int getMaxActiveFlagsPerPerson()
      Gets the maximum amount of active flags a player can have in play.
      戻り値:
      the result of player_limits.max_active_flags_per_player, from the configuration file.

    • getFlagBaseMaterial

      public static org.bukkit.Material getFlagBaseMaterial()
      戻り値:
      the value stored in flagBaseMaterial.

    • getBeaconWireFrameMaterial

      public static org.bukkit.Material getBeaconWireFrameMaterial()
      戻り値:
      the value stored in beaconWireFrameMaterial.

    • getBeaconRadius

      public static int getBeaconRadius()
      戻り値:
      the beacon radius as an integer, defined in the configuration file at the "beacon.radius" key.

    • getBeaconSize

      public static int getBeaconSize()
      戻り値:
      the beacon size as an integer, calculated as '(r * 2) - 1'.

    • getBeaconMinHeightAboveFlag

      public static int getBeaconMinHeightAboveFlag()
      戻り値:
      the beacon's minimum y-value above the flag, as defined by the 'beacon.height_above_flag.min' key.

    • getFlaggedInteractCooldown
